title: Making GOLD+ Ranked Team
body:
**LOOKING FOR SUPP/JG MAINS**

**GOING TO BE PLAYING SUNDAY/ MONDAY NIGHTS EACH WEEK**


I'm making a ranked team, I'm currently in Gold III, am 22 and main mid

Looking for players with a **positive / at least not a douche attitude**, with a stable connection and can play sunday/monday nights

Players 18+

We'll be using TeamSpeak and playing practice games before ranked


mid - Behemoth
top - dave
jg - theporkhunt
sup - 
adc - cyanphoenix 

Please reply with:

ign: 
Age: 
Pref lane:
Best 3 champs:
Current Division:

replies.body:
Age - 19
Preferred Lane - Top
Best Champions - {{champion:27}} (Ctrl + 4), Willing to learn other champion that fit our team compositions. :)
Current Rank - Gold 3 - 100LP 

Give me and add if you're interested.

ign:ThePorkHunt
Age:20
Pref lane:Jungle/sup
Best 3 champs:Leesin, Janna, Leona
Current Division:G5

Age: 18

Pref lane: ADC or support

Best 3 champs: {{champion:222}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:89}} 

Current Division: Plat 5

Age: 21

Pref lane: ADC and can fill Top

Best 3 champs: {{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:104}} 

Current Division: Plat 5 after bad placement (usually plat 1-2)

Also have Skype, Curse and TS

Hey guys Ill be on at 8pm tonight and making the team

I'm happy to fill whatever lane we need

Age: 18
Pref lane: Jungle
Best 3 champs: Lee sin, Elise, Jarvan.
Current Division: Diamond 5

Current Division: Gold 2

IGN: CyanPhoenix

IGN: whitepumah

Best 3 champs:Thresh/Jayce/Renekton
Current Division:silver 4 atm
IGN; Posso The Pimp

Hey i was gold 5 last season and im have only just started playing ranked and are in silver 3 atm but climbing hard, 

Age - 17 but turning 18 in june
Pref Lane - Adc but can also play top
Best 3 Champs - Graves, Kalista and Jinx Top lane champs are Gnar, Azir and Yasuo
